title: New free champion rotation: Ashe, Corki, Kha'Zix and more!

replies.body:
Ok Rito. When Ashe is becoming a good and Blitz is becoming a god, they send them out. Then they have Kha and Rengar with 'the hunt' and Riven and Yas with the 'Noxian Invasion'. And also they have Ekko who **was** at the peak of his League lifetime. Rito plz.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
This is bull crap i main riv and ekko and now they're in the bloody reroll
Welp as soon as i get rengar from hextech who I've wanted for aaaaages, he's free week :/
